author: Simon Difford
description: There may be some chocolate in your coffee liqueur and perhaps cocoa beans play a role in the amaro, but like the Coffee Cocktail (which has no coffee) this delicious riff on an Espresso Martini is chocolaty without really featuring the headline chocolate in the recipe.
name: Italian Chocolate Martini

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
